summary: The document is a classified communication pertaining to the release of records under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It discusses a message from Hong Kong regarding the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA)'s interest in nonofficial cover officers and agent assets, clarifying that the subject does not involve FBIS field units. The document seeks further clarification and is marked as secret, underscoring its classified status.
key_findings: The document references the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It mentions the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA)'s interest in nonofficial cover officers and agent assets.
Clarifies that the subject matter does not concern FBIS field units.
Requests additional clarification on the discussed matters.
The document's classification as secret highlights its sensitive nature.
